heading: NEW Nightmare Dungeon Tier Lists and General Farming Guide
content: Two big posts have just been published that will help everyone with their endgame progression. We have 4 new all in one post, as well as a for resource gathering. We're at a point where a lot of people are getting stuck with their progression and wanted to get up some resources to point people in the right direction. compare the best and worst Nightmare Dungeons for: Solo Experience Farming, Glyph Leveling, Group Farming and High Tier Pushing. Depending on what your goals are you can use these Tier Lists to focus on the best Nightmare Dungeons to get the most out of your time. On top of this we have a new that teaches you how to farm various items, materials and currencies in Diablo 4. Some of these are easy to gather, while others are tricky and can only come from specific areas or events. Gathered materials, plants, ores, monster parts, skins and more. Learn where to find all the goodies in this guide If you haven't already, head over to our and select the D4 role in to stay up to date with our content development. Sanctuary here we come!
